channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【ONNX GenAI Connector for Python (Experimental)】适用于 Python 的 ONNX GenAI 连接器（实验性）
item.description: 【ONNX GenAI Connector for Python (Experimental) With the latest update we added support for running models locally with the onnxruntime-genai. The onnxruntime-genai package is powered by the ONNX Runtime in the background, but first let’s clarify what ONNX, ONNX Runtime and ONNX Runtime-GenAI are. ONNX ONNX is an open-source format for AI models, both for […]】适用于 Python 的 ONNX GenAI 连接器（实验性）在最新更新中，我们添加了对使用 onnxruntime-genai 在本地运行模型的支持。 onnxruntime-genai 软件包由 ONNX Runtime 在后台提供支持，但首先让我们澄清一下 ONNX、ONNX Runtime 和 ONNX Runtime-GenAI 是什么。 ONNX ONNX 是一种人工智能模型的开源格式，既适用于 [...]

item.title: 【What is the CONTINUE_IF_FAILED equivalent of RETURN_IF_FAILED?】CONTINUE_IF_FAILED 相当于 RETURN_IF_FAILED 是什么？
item.description: 【Be careful how you write it, or better: Don't write it at all.】小心你如何写它，或者更好：根本不写它。

item.title: 【Dev Box Ready-To-Code Dev Box images template】Dev Box Ready-To-Code Dev Box 图像模板
item.description: 【Microsoft One Engineering System (1ES) team shares a sample for building Ready-To-Code Dev Box environments pre-configured with the necessary tools, repositories, and settings, ensuring consistency and reliability across teams.】Microsoft One Engineering System (1ES) 团队分享了一个示例，用于构建预配置了必要工具、存储库和设置的 Ready-To-Code Dev Box 环境，确保团队之间的一致性和可靠性。

item.title: 【Invoking Async Power: What Awaits WinForms in .NET 9】调用异步功能：.NET 9 中的 WinForms 有何期待
item.description: 【With .NET 9, we’re bringing a suite of new async APIs to WinForms, aimed at making UI updates, dialog interactions, and control management more efficient.】在 .NET 9 中，我们为 WinForms 引入了一套新的异步 API，旨在提高 UI 更新、对话框交互和控件管理的效率。

item.title: 【Effortless publishing with Azure Functions Flex Consumption】使用 Azure Functions Flex Consumer 轻松发布
item.description: 【Struggling with complex deployment processes for your serverless applications? Visual Studio 2022 introduces a seamless solution with the new Azure Functions Flex Consumption hosting plan, now generally available. Imagine a world where deploying your serverless applications to a hosting plan that supports fast scaling and VNet is as simple as a right-click. With the Azure […]】是否正在为无服务器应用程序的复杂部署流程而苦苦挣扎？ Visual Studio 2022 引入了带有新的 Azure Functions Flex 消耗托管计划的无缝解决方案，现已全面上市。想象一下这样一个世界：将无服务器应用程序部署到支持快速扩展和 VNet 的托管计划就像右键单击一样简单。与蔚蓝[...]

item.title: 【New Boards Hub Rollout Expectations】新板中心推出预期
item.description: 【Although the process may seem slow, we are steadily progressing toward rolling out the New Boards Hub to all customers. Our plan is to deprecate the old Boards experience for all Azure DevOps service users by the end Q1 2025. The rollout is advancing on two fronts. First, we are setting the New Boards Hub […]】尽管这个过程可能看起来很缓慢，但我们正在稳步向所有客户推出新板中心。我们的计划是在 2025 年第一季度末之前为所有 Azure DevOps 服务用户弃用旧的 Boards 体验。该部署正在两个方面推进。首先，我们正在设置新板中心 [...]

item.title: 【Python in Visual Studio Code – December 2024 Release】Visual Studio Code 中的 Python – 2024 年 12 月发布
item.description: 【The December 2024 release of the Python and Jupyter extensions for Visual Studio Code are now available. This month's updates include a special review of docstring generation features from Pylance, the new Python Environments extension in preview, Pylance's "full" language server mode, and much more. Keep reading to learn more!】2024 年 12 月发布的 Visual Studio Code 的 Python 和 Jupyter 扩展现已推出。本月的更新包括对 Pylance 文档字符串生成功能的特别回顾、预览中的新 Python 环境扩展、Pylance 的“完整”语言服务器模式等等。继续阅读以了解更多信息！

item.title: 【It rather involved being on the other side of this airtight hatchway: Disabling anti-malware scanning】相反，它涉及到在这个密闭舱口的另一边：禁用反恶意软件扫描
item.description: 【If you have already infiltrated the process, then you can disable things from the inside.】如果您已经渗透了该进程，那么您可以从内部禁用某些东西。

item.title: 【Effortless publishing to Azure WebJobs on Linux】轻松发布到 Linux 上的 Azure WebJobs
item.description: 【Are you tired of the cumbersome process involved in publishing your .NET console applications to Azure WebJobs on Linux? For developers yearning for a seamless and efficient method to deploy their applications, Visual Studio 2022 introduces a much-anticipated solution. Visual Studio 2022 now supports right-click publishing to Azure WebJobs on Linux, making the deployment process […]】您是否厌倦了将 .NET 控制台应用程序发布到 Linux 上的 Azure WebJobs 的繁琐过程？对于渴望以无缝、高效的方法部署应用程序的开发人员来说，Visual Studio 2022 引入了备受期待的解决方案。 Visual Studio 2022 现在支持右键单击发布到 Linux 上的 Azure WebJobs，从而使部署过程 [...]

item.title: 【Compute scaling in Azure Fluid Relay】Azure Fluid Relay 中的计算缩放
item.description: 【Explore the journey of identifying and fine-tuning the optimal Kubernetes autoscaling configuration for Azure Fluid Relay.】探索为 Azure Fluid Relay 识别和微调最佳 Kubernetes 自动缩放配置的旅程。
